text: The Districts of Portugal () are administrative regions of Portugal. It is divided into 18 districts. Each district has their own civil governor, who is part of the Central Government of Portugal. ==List== District Area Population Municipalities Parishes Province of 1936 Region Aveiro 2,808 714,200 19 147 Beira Litoral Province + Douro Litoral Province Norte, Centro Beja 10,225 152,758 14 75 Baixo Alentejo Alentejo Braga 2,673 848,185 14 347 Minho Norte Bragança 6,608 136,252 12 226 Trás-os-Montes e Alto Douro Province Norte Castelo Branco 6,675 196,264 11 120 Beira Baixa Province Centro Coimbra 3,947 430,104 17 155 Beira Baixa Province, Beira Litoral Centro Évora 7,393 166,706 14 69 Alto Alentejo Alentejo Faro 4,960 451,006 16 67 Algarve Province Algarve Guarda 5,518 160,939 14 242 Beira Alta Province (partly Trás-os-Montes e Alto Douro) Centro (partly Norte, only Vila Nova de Foz Côa) Leiria 3,515 470,930 16 110 Beira Litoral Province, Estremadura Centro Lisbon 2,800 2,250,533 16 134 Estremadura (partly Ribatejo) Lisbon (partly Alentejo) Portalegre 6,065 118,506 15 69 Alto Alentejo Province (partly Ribatejo) Alentejo Porto 2,395 1,817,117 18 243 Douro Litoral Province Norte Santarém 6,747 453,638 21 141 Ribatejo Province (partly Beira Baixa and Beira Litoral) Centro, Alentejo Setúbal 5,064 851,258 13 55 Estremadura Province, Baixo Alentejo Province Lisbon, Alentejo Viana do Castelo 2,255 244,836 10 208 Minho Norte Vila Real 4,328 206,661 14 197 Trás-os-Montes e Alto Douro Norte Viseu 5,007 377,653 24 277 Beira Alta, (partly Douro Litoral) Centro, Norte
title: Districts of Portugal
